page.title: 18Crafts in Wolsingham
page.content: Wolsingham has a{craft shop,}which sells locally produced wares _ mainly pinewood kitchen accessories as well as toys and craft kits. County Durham is famous for {Quilting,}which is done on frames.A full sized quilt takes about 300 hours to make.Patterns are marked on the material using templates;any spaces are filled with freehand patterns. Weardale patterns include goose feathers,rose, Weardale wheel and lover's knot. Skill at{needlecraft}is best seen at Wolsingham Show,where exhibits are judged in specific classes. At the Show,other crafts are also to be seen, especially Flower arranging.The Parish church has benefited from the needleworking skill of Vera Shuttleworth who has produced 120 {kneelers}over many years.
